name: Sword (S)
description: The standard long-edged weapon, with a flat, two-edged blade. It may have a basket hilt or hand protector. A scabbard to carry the sword may be attached to the belt, or to straps (or a sash) over the shoulder. Blade length varies from 700 to 950mm.

stats.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
